alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Lee (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 11:43PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bastrop and Lee Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fedor, or 9 miles southwest of Lexington, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Giddings, Lexington, Dime Box, Fedor, Paige, Circle D-KC Estates, Lake Somerville State Park & Trailway, Tanglewood, Camp Swift, Knobb Springs, Blue, Old Dime Box, McDade, Loebau, Hills, Leo, Lincoln, Manheim and Bastrop State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Texas.
